code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import'./banner.css';import bgImg from'../images/bg-no-hard-feelings.jpeg';import Moviecontent from'../components/Moviecontent';import Moviedate from'../components/Moviedate';import PlayBtn from'../components/PlayBtn';import Movieswiper from'../components/Movieswiper';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Banner(){const[movies,setMovies]=useState([]);const fetchData=()=>{fetch('http://localhost:3000/data/movieData.json').then(res=>res.json()).then(data=>setMovies(data)).catch(e=>console.log(e.message));};useEffect(()=>{fetchData();},[]);const handleSlideChange=id=>{const newMovies=movies.map(movie=>{movie.active=false;if(movie._id===id){movie.active=true;}return movie;});setMovies(newMovies);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"banner",children:[movies&&movies.length>0&&movies.map(movie=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"movie",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:movie.bgImg,alt:"Background Image",className:"bgImg ".concat(movie.active?'active':undefined)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"container-fluid",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"row",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"col-log-6 col-md-12",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Moviecontent,{movie:movie})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"col-log-6 col-md-12 ",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Moviedate,{movie:movie}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(PlayBtn,{movie:movie})]})]})})]})),movies&&movies.length>0&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Movieswiper,{slides:movies,slideChange:handleSlideChange})]})});}export default Banner;
